document.full_text: three former duke players falsely accused of rape in 2006 can pursue a lawsuit against the ex-county prosecutor and police investigators who handled their case, a federal judge ruled.
document.title: judge allows duke lacrosse lawsuit to go forward
lines_and_colors: three former duke players falsely accused of rape in 2006 can pursue a lawsuit against the ex-county prosecutor and police investigators who handled their case, a federal judge ruled.
